name: Refined Air, Inc.
description: Refined Air, Inc. is a leading provider of air quality solutions, specializing in the development and distribution of advanced air filtration and purification systems for both residential and commercial environments. Established in 2010, Refined Air aims to enhance indoor air quality and promote healthier living spaces through innovative technologies. The company's product portfolio includes high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, activated carbon air purifiers, and smart air monitoring systems that utilize cutting-edge IoT technology to provide real-time air quality data and control. Committed to sustainability, Refined Air integrates eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient designs into its products, aligning with global initiatives to reduce environmental impact. The company has garnered recognition for its contributions to improving air quality standards and is dedicated to educating consumers about the importance of clean air for health and wellness. Refined Air continues to expand its market presence through strategic partnerships and research initiatives aimed at developing next-generation air purification technologies.

seo.meta_title: Refined Air, Inc. | Advanced Air Quality Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Refined Air, Inc., a leader in air quality improvement through innovative filtration and purification systems. Explore our products and commitment to healthier living.

faq.question: What does Refined Air specialize in?
faq.answer: Refined Air specializes in air quality solutions, including air filtration and purification systems.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Refined Air?
faq.answer: Jessica Taylor is the CEO of Refined Air, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Refined Air headquartered?
faq.answer: Refined Air is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Refined Air?
faq.answer: Refined Air offers HEPA filters, activated carbon air purifiers, and smart air quality monitoring systems.
